patthana17.28:1.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana17.28:2.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana17.28:3.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
